title: Research data quality: WebSearch-result, LSP-result, Error-result
description: Analyze samples of WebSearch-result, LSP-result, Error-result. For each type: extract samples, score relevance, recommend handling strategy.

acceptanceCriteria.text: Paper 1 (WebSearch-result): Extract 5+ samples of 'WebSearch-result' from ~/.claude/projects/ JSONL files
Paper 1 (WebSearch-result): Analyze each sample - is it useful for search? Score 1-5 relevance
Paper 2 (LSP-result): Extract 5+ samples of 'LSP-result' from ~/.claude/projects/ JSONL files
Paper 2 (LSP-result): Analyze each sample - is it useful for search? Score 1-5 relevance
Paper 3 (Error-result): Extract 5+ samples of 'Error-result' from ~/.claude/projects/ JSONL files
Paper 3 (Error-result): Analyze each sample - is it useful for search? Score 1-5 relevance
